metamodel.description:
Check this to generate form models on leading frameworks.
This Form Metamodel allows to model Web Forms to integrate in your web application or web framework customizations.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce form models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR400 Form

technology.description:
Check this to generate your form models on a XForms engine.
XForms is a standard to describe the structure of web forms using precise semantics and separation of concern.
SIDE allows to optimize the production of XForms-based web forms through graphical design, automatic generation, data integration and Xforms-based engine deployment.
technology.name: XForms

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate your form models on the major release 1.5 of the XForms-based Chiba engine.
Chiba 1.5.x is the leading open source Xforms engine solution.
SIDE allows to generate the XForms templates and this generation has been heavily qualified on Chiba.

generatorVersion.version: SIDE Chiba Form Generator for Alfresco 3.4d Community

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set this field to the complete path to your messages.properties file. The file may point to a customized version of the file.

It is strongly recommended to set the option. if not specified, a default file is created in the generation folder under xformsModel/defaults.
configurationParameter.label: Messages file

configurationParameter.documentation:
Set the address to the webapp context, e.g. http://localhost:8080/xforms.
This option is accessory as it is used for providing service URLs. If not given, default values will be used.
configurationParameter.label: XForm Webapp URL

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the URL of the Alfresco instance on which you want to generate and deploy this new content model from the SIDE data model.
configurationParameter.label: Alfresco URL
